always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (reset == 1'b1) begin
    ilas_config_valid_i <= 1'b0;
  end else if (state == STATE_ILAS) begin
    if (ilas_config_start) begin
      ilas_config_valid_i <= 1'b1;
    end else if (ilas_config_addr_i == (ILAS_DATA_LENGTH-1)) begin
      ilas_config_valid_i <= 1'b0;
    end
  end
end
